snippet: A coalition of advocacy groups announced Friday that it had raised enough money to make up for financing that the Roman Catholic Church is cutting off to Compañeros, which provides immigrant services.
abstract: Coalition of advocacy groups announces that it has raised enough money to make up for financing that the Roman Catholic Church is cutting off to Companeros, a group that provides services for immigrants in southwestern Colorado; funding was cut because Companeros had joined a coalition that supports same-sex marriage.
lead_paragraph: A coalition of advocacy groups announced Friday that it had raised enough money to make up for financing that the Roman Catholic Church is cutting off to Compañeros, which provides immigrant services.

headline.seo: Colorado: Immigrant Group’s Financing Is Replaced
headline.main: Colorado: Immigrant Group’s Financing Is Replaced
headline.print_headline: Colorado: Immigrant Group’s Financing Is Replaced

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
